# api.poet.PoetSingleSiteFuture { #openprotein.api.poet.PoetSingleSiteFuture }

`api.poet.PoetSingleSiteFuture(self, session, job, page_size=config.POET_PAGE_SIZE)`

Represents a result of a PoET single-site analysis job.

## Attributes

| Name      | Type       | Description                                      |
|-----------|------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| session   | APISession | An instance of APISession for API interactions.  |
| job       | Job        | The PoET scoring job.                            |
| page_size | int        | The number of results to fetch in a single page. |

## Methods

get(verbose=False)
    Get the final results of the PoET  job.

| Name | Description |

| [get](#openprotein.api.poet.PoetSingleSiteFuture.get) | Get the results of a PoET single-site analysis job. |

### get { #openprotein.api.poet.PoetSingleSiteFuture.get }

`api.poet.PoetSingleSiteFuture.get(self, verbose=False)`

Get the results of a PoET single-site analysis job.

#### Parameters

| Name      | Type   | Description                                       | Default   |
|-----------|--------|---------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| `verbose` | bool   | If True, print verbose output. Defaults to False. | `False`   |

#### Returns

| Type                 | Description                                    |
|----------------------|------------------------------------------------|
| Dict\[bytes, float\] | A dictionary mapping mutation codes to scores. |

#### Raises

| Type     | Description                                |
|----------|--------------------------------------------|
| APIError | If there is an issue with the API request. |
